definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
category/genus (taxonomy)/family members/dependents/to belong to/subordinate to/affiliated with/be born in the year of (one of the 12 animals)/to be/to prove to be/to constitute
to join together/to fix one's attention on/to concentrate on

sentences.english: The element K promotes the dissociation of acetylene on Ru(1010)surface.
sentences.chinese: 鹼金屬K的存在促進了乙炔的分解。

sentences.english: This is a movie about Alkali Metal.
sentences.chinese: 這一套的短片是有關鹼金屬的短片。

sentences.english: The method can also be used for the calculations of the phonon dispersions of other alkali halides.
sentences.chinese: 這種方法還可用於其它鹼金屬鹵化物聲子譜的計算。

sentences.english: The hydrogenation of alkali metals using lanthanide trichloride and naphthalene as catalyst has been studied.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了稀土氯化物對鹼金屬氫化反應的催化作用。

sentences.english: And, in fact, this is the case for all the alkali metals.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，所有的鹼金屬都有這樣的性質。

sentences.english: Thirdly, the binding energy of a crown-ether molecule complexing with an alkali-metal ion is estimated.
sentences.chinese: 最後估算了冠醚分子絡合鹼金屬離子的結合能。

sentences.english: A new chalcogenide glass system containing higher content of alkali metal ions was developed.
sentences.chinese: 開發了有高含量鹼金屬離子的新型硫化物玻璃。

sentences.english: Several methods to prevent alkalis from jeopardizing are provided .
sentences.chinese: 給出了預防鹼金屬危害的方法。

sentences.english: By two alkyl halide with alkali metal or alkaline earth metal polysulfides from condensation.
sentences.chinese: 由二滷代烷與鹼金屬或鹼土金屬的多硫化物縮聚而成。

sentences.english: In this paper a scheme for the laser decelerated alkali metal atomic beam frequency standards is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出一個激光減速的鹼金屬原子束頻標的方案。

sentences.english: With this result, it is convenient to study the highly excited states in the experiments for alkalis.
sentences.chinese: 在鹼金屬的實驗中，對高激發態的研究提供了方便。
